column4: Okay new updates: I actually installed ubuntu on my second hard drive, EXT2 filesystem. But Now when I load it up, I get VGA errors, X server won't start. I have an ATI x1800 Mobile video card. Any suggestions?
Have you tried the vesa driver?
You will probably have to use fglrx driver to get #d accell
Do you have a working network connection??
From the setup, it said DHCP was successful
Can you get to a terminal?
Why not? What happens after boot?/
A bunch of weird characters show up, and something about VGA error. Then it reverts to a black screen asking for login. At that point I just CTRL+ALT+DEL back to windows
That will get you to a terminal
Anyways, the point is to see if you have a working network connection
Do you have a hardwired connection or wireless?
